name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a Senior Service Engineer with a strong technical background, I leverage my extensive experience in **communication technology**, **problem-solving**, and **customer service** to provide exceptional support in the utility sector. I possess a foundational understanding of **electrical engineering**, including **solar PV systems**, **inverters**, and **energy storage** solutions. My bilingual proficiency in English and French enhances my ability to communicate effectively with diverse customers, ensuring a tailored approach to their needs.

With 8 years of experience as a Full Stack Developer, I have a proven track record of building high-performance solutions in the healthcare and financial sectors using **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter**. My technical expertise encompasses **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**, complemented by proficiency in cloud platforms like **Azure** and **AWS**. I have led the development of enterprise-grade platforms integrating AI/ML capabilities for predictive analytics and real-time data processing, all while ensuring compliance with stringent standards such as HIPAA and PCI DSS. My strong background in **microservices architecture**, **event-driven systems**, and **CI/CD automation** helps facilitate robust application development that meets industry standards.
